20101228021734.000|20101228021735.000|CC1|>> I'M FROM ALASKA.             
20101228021735.000|20101228021737.000|CC1|OVER 54% OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR   
20101228021737.000|20101228021739.000|CC1|STATE CHOOSE NOT TO AFFILIATE   
20101228021739.000|20101228021742.000|CC1|THEMSELVES WITH A MAJOR PARTY.  
20101228021742.000|20101228021748.000|CC1|AND SO, WHEN YOU COME ON, YOU   
20101228021748.000|20101228021749.000|CC1|ARE THE REPUBLICAN, YOU'VE GOT  
20101228021749.000|20101228021752.000|CC1|TO EXPECT THERE'S GOING TO BE A

20101228022804.000|20101228022806.000|CC1|>> I WAS AT THE LOWEST LOW,

20101228022807.000|20101228022811.000|CC1|THINGS, INCLUDING LIFE.

20101228024426.000|20101228024428.000|CC1|>>> DO YOU THINK THAT A PRIVATE 
20101228024428.000|20101228024430.000|CC1|BUSINESS HAS THE RIGHT TO SAY WE
20101228024430.000|20101228024431.000|CC1|DON'T SERVE BLACK PEOPLE?       
20101228024431.000|20101228024433.000|CC1|>> I'M NOT IN FAVOR OF ANY      
20101228024433.000|20101228024434.000|CC1|DISCRIMINATION OF ANY FORM.     
20101228024434.000|20101228024436.000|CC1|I WOULD NEVER BELONG TO ANY CLUB
20101228024436.000|20101228024439.000|CC1|THAT EXCLUDED ANYBODY FOR RACE. 
20101228024439.000|20101228024441.000|CC1|WE STILL DO HAVE PRIVATE CLUBS  
20101228024441.000|20101228024443.000|CC1|IN AMERICA THAT CAN             
20101228024443.000|20101228024445.000|CC1|DISCRIMINATE, BASED ON RACE.    
20101228024445.000|20101228024446.000|CC1|BUT I THINK WHAT'S IMPORTANT    
20101228024446.000|20101228024449.000|CC1|ABOUT THIS DEBATE IS NOT GETTING
20101228024449.000|20101228024451.000|CC1|INTO ANY SPECIFIC GOTCHA ON     
20101228024451.000|20101228024451.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20101228024451.000|20101228024454.000|CC1|BUT ASKING THE QUESTION, WHAT   
20101228024454.000|20101228024455.000|CC1|ABOUT FREEDOM OF SPEECH IN      
20101228024455.000|20101228024501.000|CC1|SHOULD WE LIMIT SPEECH FROM     
20101228024501.000|20101228024502.000|CC1|PEOPLE WE FIND ABHORRENT?       
20101228024502.000|20101228024503.000|CC1|SHOULD WE LIMIT RACE IN         
20101228024503.000|20101228024504.000|CC1|SPEAKING?                       
20101228024504.000|20101228024505.000|CC1|I DON'T WANT TO BE ASSOCIATED   
20101228024505.000|20101228024507.000|CC1|WITH THOSE PEOPLE.              
20101228024507.000|20101228024508.000|CC1|BUT I DON'T WANT TO LIMIT THEIR 
20101228024508.000|20101228024511.000|CC1|SPEECH IN ANY WAY, THAT WE      
20101228024511.000|20101228024518.000|CC1|TOLERATE BORISH AND UNCIVILIZED 
20101228024518.000|20101228024518.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR.                       
20101228024518.000|20101228024520.000|CC1|THAT DOESN'T MEAN WE APPROVE OF 
20101228024520.000|20101228024521.000|CC1|IT.                             
20101228024521.000|20101228024522.000|CC1|THE PROBLEM WITH THIS DEBATE IS 
20101228024522.000|20101228024525.000|CC1|GETTING MUDDLED DOWN INTO IT.   
20101228024525.000|20101228024526.000|CC1|THE IMPLICATION IS SOMEHOW THAT 
20101228024526.000|20101228024530.000|CC1|I WOULD APPROVE OF RACISM OR    
20101228024530.000|20101228024530.000|CC1|DISCRIMINATION.                 
20101228024530.000|20101228024533.000|CC1|AND I DON'T, IN ANY FORM OR     
20101228024533.000|20101228024533.000|CC1|FASHION.                        
20101228024533.000|20101228024534.000|CC1|>> ISN'T BEING IN FAVOR OF CIVIL
20101228024534.000|20101228024536.000|CC1|RIGHTS BUT AGAINST THE CIVIL    
20101228024536.000|20101228024539.000|CC1|RIGHTS ACT, LIKE SAYING YOU'RE  
20101228024539.000|20101228024542.000|CC1|AGAINST HIGH CHOLESTEROL BUT IN 
20101228024542.000|20101228024546.000|CC1|FAVOR OF FRIED CHEESE?          
20101228024546.000|20101228024551.000|CC1|THE CIVIL RIGHTS MOVEMENT WAS TO
20101228024551.000|20101228024552.000|CC1|PROTECT.                        
20101228024552.000|20101228024552.000|CC1|THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT STEPPED  
20101228024552.000|20101228024554.000|CC1|IN AND SAID, YOU DON'T HAVE A   
20101228024554.000|20101228024555.000|CC1|CHOICE TO MAKE.                 
20101228024555.000|20101228024555.000|CC1|THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT IS COMING
20101228024555.000|20101228024557.000|CC1|IN AND SAYING, YOU CAN'T MAKE   
20101228024557.000|20101228024558.000|CC1|THAT CHOICE AS A BUSINESS OWNER.
20101228024558.000|20101228024559.000|CC1|WHICH SIDE OF THAT DEBATE WOULD 
20101228024559.000|20101228024601.000|CC1|YOU PUT YOURSELF ON?            
20101228024601.000|20101228024604.000|CC1|>> IN THE TOTALITY OF IT, I'M IN
20101228024604.000|20101228024606.000|CC1|FAVOR OF THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT 
20101228024606.000|20101228024609.000|CC1|BEING INVOLVED IN CIVIL RIGHTS. 
20101228024609.000|20101228024612.000|CC1|AND THAT'S, YOU KNOW, MOSTLY    
20101228024612.000|20101228024615.000|CC1|WHAT THE CIVIL RIGHTS ACT WAS   
20101228024615.000|20101228024615.000|CC1|ABOUT.                          
20101228024615.000|20101228024616.000|CC1|THERE'S TEN DIFFERENT TITLES TO 
20101228024616.000|20101228024618.000|CC1|THE CIVIL RIGHTS ACT.           
20101228024618.000|20101228024619.000|CC1|AND NINE OUT OF TEN DEAL WITH   
20101228024619.000|20101228024620.000|CC1|PUBLIC INSTITUTIONS.            
20101228024620.000|20101228024623.000|CC1|AND I'M ABSOLUTELY IN FAVOR OF. 
20101228024623.000|20101228024624.000|CC1|ONE DEALS WITH PRIVATE          
20101228024624.000|20101228024625.000|CC1|INSTITUTIONS.                   
20101228024625.000|20101228024626.000|CC1|AND HAD I BEEN AROUND, I WOULD  
20101228024626.000|20101228024629.000|CC1|HAVE TRIED TO MODIFY THAT.      
20101228024629.000|20101228024630.000|CC1|BUT THE OTHER THING ABOUT       
20101228024630.000|20101228024631.000|CC1|LEGISLATION, AND THIS IS WHY    
20101228024631.000|20101228024632.000|CC1|IT'S HARD TO SAY EXACTLY WHERE  
20101228024632.000|20101228024634.000|CC1|YOU ARE SOMETIMES, IS THAT WHEN 
20101228024634.000|20101228024637.000|CC1|YOU SUPPORT NINE OUT OF TEN     
20101228024637.000|20101228024638.000|CC1|THINGS IN A GOOD PIECE OF       
20101228024638.000|20101228024640.000|CC1|LEGISLATION, DO YOU VOTE FOR IT 
20101228024640.000|20101228024641.000|CC1|OR AGAINST IT?                  
20101228024641.000|20101228024642.000|CC1|AND I THINK SOMETIMES THOSE ARE 
20101228024642.000|20101228024643.000|CC1|DIFFICULT SITUATIONS.           
20101228024643.000|20101228024644.000|CC1|>> LET'S SAY THERE'S A TOWN     
20101228024644.000|20101228024644.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW.                      
20101228024644.000|20101228024646.000|CC1|AND THE OWNER OF THE TOWN       
20101228024646.000|20101228024648.000|CC1|SWIMMING CLUB SAYS, WE'RE NOT   
20101228024648.000|20101228024650.000|CC1|GOING TO ALLOW BLACK KIDS AT OUR
20101228024650.000|20101228024650.000|CC1|POOL.                           
20101228024650.000|20101228024652.000|CC1|AND THE OWNER OF THE BOWLING    
20101228024652.000|20101228024654.000|CC1|ALLEY IN TOWN SAYS, WE'RE NOT   
20101228024654.000|20101228024655.000|CC1|GOING TO ALLOW BLACK PATRONS.   
20101228024655.000|20101228024657.000|CC1|AND THE OWNER OF THE SKATING    
20101228024657.000|20101228024659.000|CC1|RINK IN TOWN SAYS, WE'RE NOT    
20101228024659.000|20101228024702.000|CC1|GOING TO ALLOW BLACK PEOPLE TO  
20101228024702.000|20101228024703.000|CC1|SKATE HERE.                     
20101228024703.000|20101228024706.000|CC1|YOU MAY THINK THAT'S ABHORRENT  
20101228024706.000|20101228024708.000|CC1|AND A BAD BUSINESS DECISION.    
20101228024708.000|20101228024711.000|CC1|BUT UNLESS IT'S ILLEGAL, THERE'S
20101228024711.000|20101228024714.000|CC1|NOTHING UNDER YOUR WORLD VIEW,  
20101228024714.000|20101228024716.000|CC1|THERE'S NOTHING TO STOP THE     
20101228024716.000|20101228024721.000|CC1|COUNTRY FROM SEGREGATING WITHOUT
20101228024721.000|20101228024724.000|CC1|THE CIVIL RIGHTS ACT OF 1964,   
20101228024724.000|20101228024725.000|CC1|WHICH YOU SAY YOU HAVE ISSUES   
20101228024725.000|20101228024726.000|CC1|WITH.                           
20101228024726.000|20101228024727.000|CC1|>> WE HAD A LOFT IT OVER THE    
20101228024727.000|20101228024728.000|CC1|LAST 30 OR 40 YEARS.            
20101228024728.000|20101228024730.000|CC1|I WOULD SAY THAT WE DID SOME    
20101228024730.000|20101228024731.000|CC1|VERY IMPORTANT THINGS IN THE    
20101228024731.000|20101228024735.000|CC1|'60s, THAT I'M ALL IN FAVOR OF. 
20101228024735.000|20101228024738.000|CC1|THAT WAS DESEGREGATING SCHOOLS. 
20101228024738.000|20101228024741.000|CC1|DESEGREGATING PUBLIC            
20101228024741.000|20101228024741.000|CC1|TRANSPORTATIONS.                
20101228024741.000|20101228024746.000|CC1|>> HOW ABOUT DESEGREGATING LUNCH
20101228024746.000|20101228024746.000|CC1|COUNTERS.                       
20101228024746.000|20101228024748.000|CC1|WALGREENS LUNCH COUNTERS.       
20101228024748.000|20101228024749.000|CC1|FORCIBLY BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT 
20101228024749.000|20101228024751.000|CC1|GOT INVOLVED?                   
20101228024751.000|20101228024752.000|CC1|>> WHAT HAPPENS.                
20101228024752.000|20101228024752.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20101228024752.000|20101228024755.000|CC1|WHAT IT GETS INTO IS, IF YOU    
20101228024755.000|20101228024756.000|CC1|DECIDE THAT RESTAURANTS ARE     
20101228024756.000|20101228024759.000|CC1|PUBLICLY OWNED AND NOT PRIVATELY
20101228024759.000|20101228024801.000|CC1|OWNED, THEN DO YOU SAY THAT YOU 
20101228024801.000|20101228024802.000|CC1|SHOULD HAVE THE RIGHT TO BRING  
20101228024802.000|20101228024804.000|CC1|YOUR GUN INTO A RESTAURANT, EVEN
20101228024804.000|20101228024807.000|CC1|THOUGH THE OWNER OF THE         
20101228024807.000|20101228024808.000|CC1|RESTAURANT SAYS, WELL, NO.      
20101228024808.000|20101228024810.000|CC1|WE DON'T WANT TO HAVE GUNS IN   
20101228024810.000|20101228024810.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20101228024810.000|20101228024812.000|CC1|THE BAR SAYS, WE DON'T WANT TO  
20101228024812.000|20101228024814.000|CC1|HAVE GUNS IN HERE, BECAUSE      
20101228024814.000|20101228024815.000|CC1|PEOPLE MIGHT DRINK AND START    
20101228024815.000|20101228024817.000|CC1|FIGHTING AND SHOOT EACH OTHER.  
20101228024817.000|20101228024818.000|CC1|DOES THE OWNER OF THE RESTAURANT
20101228024818.000|20101228024819.000|CC1|OWN HIS RESTAURANT?             
20101228024819.000|20101228024821.000|CC1|OR DOES THE GOVERNMENT OWN HIS  
20101228024821.000|20101228024821.000|CC1|RESTAURANT?                     
20101228024821.000|20101228024823.000|CC1|THESE ARE IMPORTANT             
20101228024823.000|20101228024824.000|CC1|PHILOSOPHICAL DEBATES.          
20101228024824.000|20101228024826.000|CC1|BUT NOT A VERY PRACTICAL        
20101228024826.000|20101228024828.000|CC1|DISCUSSION.                     
20101228024828.000|20101228024831.000|CC1|>> BUT IT WAS PRACTICAL TO      
20101228024831.000|20101228024833.000|CC1|PEOPLE TRYING TO DESEGREGATE THE
20101228024833.000|20101228024834.000|CC1|LUNCH COUNTERS.                 
20101228024834.000|20101228024838.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT A HYPOTHETICAL,     
20101228024838.000|20101228024839.000|CC1|DR. PAUL.                       
20101228024839.000|20101228024844.000|CC1|>> I THINK WHAT YOU'RE DOING IS 
20101228024844.000|20101228024847.000|CC1|YOU'RE CON FLATING THE ISSUE.   
20101228024847.000|20101228024849.000|CC1|THAT THIS HAS ANY BIT OF

20101228024851.000|20101228024853.000|CC1|SAYING THAT CONDONES VIOLENCE.  
20101228024853.000|20101228024854.000|CC1|AND ANY KIND OF VIOLENCE LIKE   
20101228024854.000|20101228024857.000|CC1|THAT, DESERVES -- PEOPLE DESERVE
20101228024857.000|20101228024859.000|CC1|TO BE PUT IN JAIL.              
20101228024859.000|20101228024900.000|CC1|SO, NOBODY IS CONDONING ANY OF  
20101228024900.000|20101228024901.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101228024901.000|20101228024902.000|CC1|>> I UNDERSTAND THAT YOU'RE NOT 
20101228024902.000|20101228024903.000|CC1|CONDONING VIOLENCE.             
20101228024903.000|20101228024906.000|CC1|BUT THE PEOPLE WHO WERE BEATEN

20101228024909.000|20101228024912.000|CC1|WOOLWORTH'S LUNCH COUNTERS.

20101228024914.000|20101228024917.000|CC1|FOR PRIVATE BUSINESSES TO BE    
20101228024917.000|20101228024919.000|CC1|DESEGREGATED BY THE GOVERNMENT. 
20101228024919.000|20101228024921.000|CC1|>> PEOPLE WHO COMMIT VIOLENCE ON
20101228024921.000|20101228024922.000|CC1|OTHER INDIVIDUALS SHOULD GO TO  
20101228024922.000|20101228024924.000|CC1|PRISON AND GO TO JAIL.

20101228024926.000|20101228024928.000|CC1|CONDONE VIOLENCE ON INDIVIDUALS.
20101228024928.000|20101228024930.000|CC1|>> AND SHOULD WOOLWORTH'S LUNCH 
20101228024930.000|20101228024933.000|CC1|COUNTER BE ALLOWED TO STAY

20101228024933.000|20101228024935.000|CC1|JUST YES OR NO.                 
20101228024935.000|20101228024938.000|CC1|>> WHAT I THINK WOULD HAPPEN -- 
20101228024938.000|20101228024939.000|CC1|I DON'T BELIEVE IN ANY          
20101228024939.000|20101228024940.000|CC1|DISCRIMINATION.                 
20101228024940.000|20101228024941.000|CC1|I DON'T THINK THAT PRIVATE

20101228024942.000|20101228024944.000|CC1|I WOULDN'T SUPPORT, WOULDN'T GO 
20101228024944.000|20101228024944.000|CC1|TO.

20101228024954.000|20101228024956.000|CC1|THAT YOU WANT TO BRING UP.      
20101228024956.000|20101228024957.000|CC1|IF YOU WANT AN ANSWER, YOU HAVE 
20101228024957.000|20101228025000.000|CC1|TO SAY THAT YOU DECIDE THE RULES
20101228025000.000|20101228025001.000|CC1|FOR ALL RESTAURANTS.            
20101228025001.000|20101228025002.000|CC1|AND DO YOU WANT TO ALLOW THEM TO
20101228025002.000|20101228025003.000|CC1|CARRY WEAPONS INTO RESTAURANTS.

20101228025004.000|20101228025006.000|CC1|SECOND AMENDMENT.               
20101228025006.000|20101228025010.000|CC1|BUT I THINK WANTING TO THE SAME 
20101228025010.000|20101228025012.000|CC1|>> PRIVATE BUSINESSES TO        
20101228025012.000|20101228025013.000|CC1|DISCRIMINATE ALONG THE BASIS OF 
20101228025013.000|20101228025015.000|CC1|PROPERTY RIGHTS IS AN EXTREME   
20101228025015.000|20101228025015.000|CC1|VIEW.                           
20101228025015.000|20101228025016.000|CC1|AND I THINK THAT'S GOING TO BE  
20101228025016.000|20101228025018.000|CC1|THE FOCUS ON YOUR CANDIDACY NOW 
20101228025018.000|20101228025019.000|CC1|AND YOU'RE GOING TO HAVE A LOT  
20101228025019.000|20101228025020.000|CC1|MORE DEBATES LIKE THIS.         
20101228025020.000|20101228025021.000|CC1|I HOPE YOU DON'T HOLD IT AGAINST
20101228025021.000|20101228025023.000|CC1|ME FOR BRINGING IT UP.          
20101228025023.000|20101228025025.000|CC1|I THINK THIS IS GOING TO BE A   
20101228025025.000|20101228025026.000|CC1|CONTINUING DISCUSSION FOR A LONG
20101228025026.000|20101228025027.000|CC1|TIME, DR. PAUL.                 
20101228025027.000|20101228025028.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK WHAT YOU'VE    
20101228025028.000|20101228025030.000|CC1|DONE IS YOU BRING UP SOMETHING  
20101228025030.000|20101228025032.000|CC1|THAT REALLY IS NOT AN ISSUE,    
20101228025032.000|20101228025034.000|CC1|NOTHING I'VE EVER SPOKEN ABOUT  
20101228025034.000|20101228025036.000|CC1|ANY INDICATION THAT I AM        
20101228025036.000|20101228025038.000|CC1|INTERESTED IN ANY LEGISLATION   
20101228025038.000|20101228025040.000|CC1|CONCERNING SO WHAT YOU BRING UP 
20101228025040.000|20101228025043.000|CC1|IS SORT OF A RED HERRING.       
20101228025043.000|20101228025044.000|CC1|IT'S A POLITICAL POINT, IT'S    
20101228025044.000|20101228025046.000|CC1|BROUGHT UP AS AN ATTACK WEAPON  
20101228025046.000|20101228025047.000|CC1|FROM THE OTHER SIDE AND THAT'S  
20101228025047.000|20101228025048.000|CC1|THE WAY IT WILL BE USED.        
20101228025048.000|20101228025050.000|CC1|I THINK A LOT OF TIMES THESE    
20101228025050.000|20101228025051.000|CC1|ATTACKS FALL BACK ON THEMSELVES 
20101228025051.000|20101228025053.000|CC1|AND I DON'T THINK IT WILL HAVE  
20101228025053.000|20101228025055.000|CC1|ANY EFFECT BECAUSE THE THING IS,
20101228025055.000|20101228025057.000|CC1|IS THAT EVERY FIBER OF MY BEING 
20101228025057.000|20101228025059.000|CC1|DOESN'T BELIEVE IN              
20101228025059.000|20101228025059.000|CC1|DISCRIMINATION, DOESN'T BELIEVE 
20101228025059.000|20101228025102.000|CC1|THAT WE SHOULD HAVE THAT IN OUR 
20101228025102.000|20101228025103.000|CC1|SOCIETY, AND TO IMPLY OTHERWISE 
20101228025103.000|20101228025104.000|CC1|IS JUST DISHONEST.              
20101228025104.000|20101228025107.000|CC1|>> DR. RAND PAUL, REPUBLICAN    
20101228025107.000|20101228025108.000|CC1|NOMINEE FOR THE UNITED STATES   
20101228025108.000|20101228025109.000|CC1|SENATE IN KENTUCKY WHERE HE'LL  
20101228025109.000|20101228025111.000|CC1|BE REPRESENTING NOT ONLY HIS OWN
20101228025111.000|20101228025112.000|CC1|VIEWS ABOUT HOW TO LIVE BUT WHAT
20101228025112.000|20101228025114.000|CC1|KIND OF LAWS WE SHOULD HAVE IN  
20101228025114.000|20101228025114.000|CC1|AMERICA.                        
20101228025114.000|20101228025118.000|CC1|SIR, I ENJOY TALKING WITH THESE 
20101228025118.000|20101228025119.000|CC1|THINGS WITH YOU.                
20101228025119.000|20101228025120.000|CC1|I COULDN'T DISAGREE MORE BUT I  
20101228025120.000|20101228025122.000|CC1|DO RESPECT YOU FOR COMING ON THE
20101228025122.000|20101228025124.000|CC1|SHOW AND FOR BEING ABLE TO HAVE 
20101228025124.000|20101228025125.000|CC1|THIS CIVIL DISCUSSION ABOUT IT. 
20101228025125.000|20101228025125.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20101228025125.000|20101228025127.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU, RACHEL.           
20101228025127.000|20101228025510.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101228025127.000|20101228025128.000|CC1|>>> I THINK THE RAND PAUL       
20101228025128.000|20101228025130.000|CC1|INTERVIEW RIGHT AFTER HE WON THE
20101228025130.000|20101228025131.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN PRIMARY IN KENTUCKY  
20101228025131.000|20101228025132.000|CC1|WAS AN IMPORTANT MOMENT FOR US. 
20101228025132.000|20101228025134.000|CC1|I STILL HAVE A LOT OF RESPECT   
20101228025134.000|20101228025135.000|CC1|FOR RAND PAUL AS A PERSON.      
20101228025135.000|20101228025137.000|CC1|I HOPE THAT BOTH HIM AND HIS    
20101228025137.000|20101228025139.000|CC1|DAD, RON PAUL, WILL RETURN TO   
20101228025139.000|20101228025140.000|CC1|WHAT IT USED TO BE LIKE BETWEEN
